name: SII_FDS_OPC1
action: [IF]([GT](<*VALUE(Number of OPC Interface Types)*>,0)){<*ASSIGNVALUE(SII Function Design Specification -OPC1:<* Eval(16 * 0.9 + (<*VALUE(Number of OPC Interface Types)*> - 1 ) * 4 *0.9) *>)*>}{<*ASSIGNVALUE(SII Function Design Specification -OPC1:0)*>}[ENDIF]
description:
SII Function Design Specification -OPC1

Calculated Hrs = Hrs = IF(opt > 0,16*0.9 + (opt-1)*4*0.9,0)
